main event: A machinist observed a light blue object flying straight and abruptly fading from view during a dark night with thunderstorms in the area.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 5 feet in length., The sighting included a very bright light and a loud snapping sound., The car radio and motor stopped when the object was present., The object disappeared to the northwest at a height of more than 1300 feet., The entire sighting lasted about two seconds.
witness description: machinist who wears glasses but did not have them on during the sighting
